title: Fortune Teller
text:
There is a wildfire
Somewhere in the sky
I hear it
But don’t let me see it
I know it’s there
You can’t hide it from me
But please try
Don’t let me see
It’s not good for me

I know my present and my past
I know my future
All too well
But I don’t feel it
I know exactly what to do
And when to say ____________

But ’til I feel it
Don’t let me see it
I’d rather leave it
Alone
